mcq.statement: Which significant Islamic legal text was compiled during Aurangzeb Alamgir's reign?
mcq.one_liner: The **Fatawa-e-Alamgiri** was compiled during the reign of Aurangzeb Alamgir, serving as a major Islamic legal text of the Mughal era.
